name: ChatBotSpringAI
desc: AI-powered chatbot built with Spring Boot and OpenAI API. Features RESTful endpoints for intelligent conversations, demonstrating AI integration with enterprise Java applications.
stacks: Java, Spring Boot, OpenAI, REST API, Maven

name: WorkFolio
desc: Full-stack portfolio management system with Spring Boot backend, Spring Security authentication, Thymeleaf templates, and MySQL database. Implements DAO design pattern.
stacks: Java, Spring Boot, Spring Security, Thymeleaf, MySQL, Bootstrap

name: Chatterbox
desc: Real-time chat application using Spring Boot WebSocket for instant messaging. Features live communication with modern frontend integration.
stacks: Java, Spring Boot, WebSocket, JavaScript, HTML/CSS

name: Spring Security Projects
desc: Comprehensive Spring Security implementation showcasing JWT authentication, role-based authorization, CORS handling, and custom authentication providers.
stacks: Java, Spring Boot, Spring Security, JWT, REST API

name: ShipmentXpress
desc: Logistics and shipment management system built with Java, Hibernate ORM, and MySQL. Demonstrates enterprise-level database operations and entity mapping.

name: Shopzilla E-Commerce Platform
desc: Complete online shopping platform for buyers and sellers. Features product management, inventory tracking, secure transactions, and user-friendly interface.

name: CryptoVerve Bank
desc: Banking system simulation with account management, transactions, deposits, withdrawals, and balance inquiries. Built with Java Swing GUI.

name: User Management System
desc: User management backend system for handling user registration, authentication, and profile management.

name: Tic Tac Toe - JavaFX
desc: Classic Tic Tac Toe game built with JavaFX. Features modern GUI, game logic, and interactive gameplay experience.

name: GestureGlide
desc: Computer vision project using Python and CVZone for gesture recognition. Play Rock-Paper-Scissors using hand gestures detected via camera.

name: SkyScope Weather App
desc: Weather application that fetches real-time weather data using Weather API. Displays current conditions, forecasts, and weather metrics.

name: SnapResize
desc: Image processing application using OpenCV and Tkinter. Resize, crop, and manipulate images with an intuitive GUI interface.

name: EchoCharm
desc: Text-to-speech application using Python pyttsx3 library. Convert text input to natural-sounding speech output.

name: YouTube Clone
desc: YouTube clone enabling users to search, view, and enjoy videos in full-screen mode. Offers seamless video browsing experience.

name: Outlook India Clone
desc: News website clone covering current affairs, politics, lifestyle, entertainment, and more. Responsive design with modern UI.

name: Movie Search App
desc: Web application to search for any movie and get details like IMDB rating, release year, genre, and more using OMDB API.

name: Any Color Extension
desc: Browser extension to pick any color from web pages. Features color picker, hex code display, and clipboard copy functionality.
